table.title: Overview
table.searchString: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" | stats first(name) as OS first(version) as Version first(arch) as Architecture by host jvmDescription

chart.title: CPU Usage by each JVM
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" OR "java.lang:type=Runtime" | stats max(jvmUptime) as uptime max(cpuTime) as cputime max(processors) as cpus by jvmDescription,_time | streamstats current=f global=f window=1 first(uptime) as next_uptime first(cputime) as next_cputime by jvmDescription | eval d_uptime=uptime-next_uptime | eval d_cputime=cputime-next_cputime | eval cpu=(d_cputime/(d_uptime*100*cpus)) | chart max(cpu) by _time,jvmDescription

chart.title: System Load
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" | timechart span=1m avg(sysLoad) by host

chart.title: File Descriptors(*Nix Hosts only)
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" |timechart span=1m max(openFD) as "Open File Descriptors" ,max(maxFD) as "Max File Descriptors" by host

chart.title: Physical Memory
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" |eval memoryUsed=(physMem-freePhysMem) | timechart span=5m max(physMem) as "Total Memory" ,max(memoryUsed) as "Used Memory" by host

chart.title: Swap Space
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" |eval swapUsed=(swapSpace-freeSwap) | timechart span=5m max(swapSpace) as "Total Swap" ,max(swapUsed) as "Used Swap" by host

chart.title: Committed Virtual Memory
chart.searchTemplate: index=jmx mbean="java.lang:type=OperatingSystem" | timechart span=1m avg(committed) by host
